text: Akave, avarutaiya iraivan atai anpay ankikarittu paricuttamakavum, alakakavum atai valarac ceytu atai (valarkka) jakariyya porupperruk kollumarum ceytan. Jakariyya appillai irunta matattirkul nulaiyum potellam, avalitattil (etenum) unavup porul iruppataik kantu ‘‘maryame! Itu unakku etu? (Enkiruntu vantatu?)'' Enru ketpar. Atarkaval ‘‘itu allahvitamiruntutan (varukiratu). Enenral, niccayamaka allah, tan virumpiyavarkalukku alavinriye unavalikkiran'' enru kuruval
